name: Paragon of Victory
text: You are a chosen champion of the gods. In battle, few can stand against you in personal combat. Even if they could match your skill, the divine power you command inspires your allies to great deeds. Paragons of victory stand at the center of many tales of great victories won against overwhelming odds. When the time comes for the gods to stand against an overwhelming foe, you can expect to fight at the forefront of that battle, wherever that may be.

features.paragon'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain one of the following benefits of your choice
features.turningOfTheTide(11thLevel): Whenever you drop a nonminion enemy below 1 hit point with an attack, you gain one of the following benefits of your choice
